class.description: Provides data for the OnToBeAdded event.

property.name: Exclude
property.descrip: Set to _TRUE_ to prevent the file from being added.

property.name: FileName
property.descrip: The name of the file to be added (when adding files via the Zip.AppendFiles and Zip.AppendFilesEx method calls).

property.name: FileSize
property.descrip: The size of the file to be added.
